attributes.action: force Microsoft to stop price fixing of its new Windows operating system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to the actions of the European Union the UK is being "Punished" by Microsoft by passing the costs of the $357 million fine from the antitrust case on to the consumer.

This cost is that a UK consumer has to pay 99 Pounds for Windows Vista where as a US consumer can purchase the operating system in the United States for 99 dollars.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
